name: Glycolic Acid 7% Toning Solution
description: An exfoliating toner that improves texture and brightness, ideal for oily and combination skin when used a few nights per week.

name: Pore-Reducing Toner
description: A toner that helps reduce the appearance of pores and shine, ideal for oily and combination skin.

name: Supple Preparation Facial Toner
description: A hydrating toner that supports comfort and moisture, ideal for dry and sensitive skin.

name: Rosewater Facial Toner
description: A simple refreshing toner that helps lightly hydrate, ideal for normal to dry and sensitive skin.

name: Green Tea Fresh Toner
description: A soothing toner that helps balance oil and calm redness, ideal for oily and sensitive skin.

name: Gentle Toning Lotion
description: A gentle toner that refreshes and comforts skin, ideal for sensitive and dry skin.

name: Calendula Herbal-Extract Toner
description: An alcohol-free toner that helps soothe and refresh, ideal for normal to oily and combination skin.

name: Alcohol-Free Toner
description: A basic toner that refreshes without dryness, ideal for sensitive and combination skin.

name: Rice Toner
description: A milky toner that supports brightness and hydration, ideal for normal to dry skin.

name: SoonJung pH 5.5 Relief Toner
description: A calming toner that supports the skin barrier, ideal for sensitive and dry skin.

name: Hydrating Toner
description: A hydration-focused toner that supports the skin barrier, ideal for dry and sensitive skin.

name: Witch Hazel Toner
description: A refreshing toner that helps reduce oiliness, ideal for oily skin (avoid if very sensitive).

name: Heartleaf 77% Soothing Toner
description: A soothing toner that helps calm redness and irritation, ideal for sensitive and combination skin.

name: Hatomugi Skin Conditioner
description: A lightweight watery toner for daily hydration, ideal for normal to oily skin.

name: Moisture Surge Face Spray
description: A hydrating mist-toner that refreshes throughout the day, ideal for dry and sensitive skin.
